Name: Bunker 2322
About the game: 'Bunker' is a visual novel set in a world where human civilization has been almost completely destroyed. The main character wakes up from cryosleep in a secret bunker. She doesn't remember anything about herself or what happened to the world. Explore the deserted land, meet the few survivors, find the family of the main character! In this adventure you are waiting for: Multiple endings Multi - faceted characters The developed world A melancholic story about the search for loved ones Illustrations in a unique author's style
